story_00_01001/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hey there, pal! Welcome to the world of
Pokémon Masters!
story_00_01001/2401_1001_0200_10: I’m Blue! I’m a pretty big deal around here.
story_00_01001/2401_1001_0300_10:
Not sure if you know this, but Pokémon battles
here are a little different!
story_00_01001/2401_1001_0400_10: Here, I’ll show you the ropes!
story_00_01001/2401_1001_0500_10:
That battle was great, wasn’t it? What you saw
right there was a team battle!
story_00_01001/2401_1001_0600_10: But where are my manners? Tell me about you!
story_00_01001/2401_1001_0700_10:
So your name’s [Name:PlayerNickname ], huh?
That’s got a nice ring to it.
story_00_01001/2401_1001_0800_10:
Well, [Name:PlayerNickname ], you better
buckle up, because there’s a huge team
tournament right around the corner.
story_00_01001/2401_1001_0900_10: The Pokémon Masters League! Or PML, for short.
story_00_01001/2401_1001_1000_10:
It’s like one big festival for Pokémon Trainers
like us. Trainers from all over the world gather
to form teams of three and battle it out!
story_00_01001/2401_1001_1100_10:
Each Trainer can only use one Pokémon, though,
so the real challenge is how well your team
works together!
story_00_01001/2401_1001_1200_10:
We’re gonna meet so many awesome Trainers
here, it’s kind of crazy to think about. I know
I’m excited!
story_00_01001/2401_1001_1300_10:
Well then, off we go! To the world of
Pokémon Masters!
